00001       module SBP_Coef_Module
00002 
00003       use precision_vars, only: wp
00004 
00005       implicit none; save
00006 
00007       real(wp),  parameter                      :: tol=1.0e-12_wp
00008 
00009       private
00010       public  ::  Define_CSR_Operators,Pmat,Pinv,iD1,jD1,D1,iD2,jD2,D2,nnz_D2
00011       public  ::  nnz_D1_per,iD1_per,jD1_per,D1_per
00012       
00013       real(wp),  dimension(:), allocatable :: Pmat,Pinv,D1,D2,D1_per
00014       integer,   dimension(:), allocatable :: iD1, iD2,jD1,jD2,iD1_per,jD1_per
00015       integer                              :: nnz_D2,nnz_D1_per
00016       
00017 
00018       contains
00019 !==============================================================================
00020       subroutine Define_CSR_Operators(n,h)
00021       
00022       
00023       integer,  intent(in) :: n
00024       real(wp), intent(in) :: h
00025       integer,  parameter  :: order = 242
00026 
00027 !     CSR storage for derivative matrices
00028       integer             :: nnz_D1
00029 
00030       allocate(iD1(n+1),iD2(n+1),Pmat(n),Pinv(n))
00031 
00032       if(order == 242) then
00033         nnz_D1 = 28+4*(n-8)
00034         allocate(jD1(nnz_D1),D1(nnz_D1))
00035         nnz_D2 = 38+5*(n-8)
00036         allocate(jD2(nnz_D2),D2(nnz_D2))
00037       endif
00038       
00039       nnz_D1_per=4*n
00040       allocate(iD1_per(n+1),jD1_per(nnz_D1_per),D1_per(nnz_D1_per))
00041       
00042       call D1_242(n,nnz_D1,iD1,jD1,D1,h)
00043       call D2_242(n,nnz_D2,iD2,jD2,D2,h)
00044       call D1_periodic(n,nnz_D1_per,iD1_per,jD1_per,D1_per,h)
00045 
00046       end subroutine Define_CSR_Operators
00047 !==============================================================================         
00048       subroutine D1_periodic(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00049 
00050       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00051 
00052       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00053       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00054 
00055       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00056       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00057 
00058       integer                                   :: i,j
00059       integer                                   :: icnt, jcnt
00060 
00061       real(wp),  dimension(5)      :: d1mat
00062       real(wp) :: tol
00063       
00064       
00065        !  Diagonal matrix norm needed for 1st- and 2nd-order derivatives 
00066       Pmat(:) = 1.0_wp*h
00067       Pinv(:) = 1.0_wp / Pmat(:)
00068       
00069       d1mat(:)= (/1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-8.0_wp/12.0_wp,0.0_wp, &
00070      &            8.0_wp/12.0_wp,-1.0_wp/12.0_wp/)
00071       
00072       tol=1.0e-12_wp
00073       
00074       ia(:) = (/ (i, i=1,n*4+1,4) /)
00075       ja(:) = 0      ;
00076       a(:) = 0.0_wp ;
00077       ia(1) = 1      ! start at beginning of array   
00078          
00079       a(1:2)=d1mat(4:5); ja(1:2)=(/2,3/)
00080       a(3:4)=d1mat(1:2); ja(3:4)=(/n-1,n/)
00081       a(5)  =d1mat(2)  ; ja(5)  =1
00082       a(6:7)=d1mat(4:5); ja(6:7)=(/3,4/)
00083       a(8)  =d1mat(1)  ; ja(8)  =n
00084       icnt  = 8
00085           
00086       do i = 3,n-2
00087         jcnt = 0 
00088         do j = 1,5
00089           if(abs(d1mat(j)) >= tol) then
00090               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00091           ja(icnt) = i-3+j
00092            a(icnt) = d1mat(j)
00093           endif
00094         enddo
00095 !        ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00096       enddo
00097       
00098       a(icnt+1)       =d1mat(5)  ; ja(icnt+1)       =1
00099       a(icnt+2:icnt+3)=d1mat(1:2); ja(icnt+2:icnt+3)=(/n-3,n-2/)
00100       a(icnt+4)       =d1mat(4)  ; ja(icnt+4)       =n
00101       a(icnt+5:icnt+6)=d1mat(4:5); ja(icnt+5:icnt+6)=(/1,2/)            
00102       a(icnt+7:icnt+8)=d1mat(1:2); ja(icnt+7:icnt+8)=(/n-2,n-1/)  
00103       a(:)=a(:)/h   
00104       
00105       end subroutine D1_periodic
00106 !===============================================================================   
00107      
00108       subroutine D1_242(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00109 
00110       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00111 
00112       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00113       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00114 
00115       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00116       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00117 
00118       integer                                   :: i,j
00119       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)      :: d1mat
00120       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:,:)    :: D1blk, D2blk, D1blkT
00121 
00122       continue
00123 
00124       if(n < 8) then 
00125         write(*,*)'Dimension not large enough to support D242: stopping'
00126         stop
00127       endif
00128       allocate(d1mat(1:5))
00129       allocate(D1blk(1:4,1:6))
00130       allocate(D2blk(1:4,1:6))
00131       allocate(D1blkT(1:6,1:4))
00132 
00133     !  h = 1.0_wp / (n - 1)
00134 
00135       !  Diagonal matrix norm needed for 1st- and 2nd-order derivatives 
00136       Pmat(1:  4) = reshape((/17.0_wp/48.0_wp,59.0_wp/48.0_wp,43.0_wp/48.0_wp,49.0_wp/48.0_wp/),(/4/))
00137       Pmat(5:n-4) = 1.0_wp
00138       Pmat(n-3:n) = reshape((/49.0_wp/48.0_wp,43.0_wp/48.0_wp,59.0_wp/48.0_wp,17.0_wp/48.0_wp/),(/4/))
00139 
00140       Pmat(:)=Pmat(:)*h
00141 
00142 
00143       Pinv(:) = 1.0_wp / Pmat(:)
00144 
00145       d1mat(:)= reshape((/1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-8.0_wp/12.0_wp,0.0_wp,8.0_wp/12.0_wp,-1.0_wp/12.0_wp/),(/5/))
00146 
00147       !  Boundary closure data for first derivative operators,  Note reshape does column first; hence the transpose
00148       D1blkT  = reshape(                                                                                               &
00149               & (/-24.0_wp/17.0_wp, 59.0_wp/34.0_wp, -4.0_wp/17.0_wp,-3.0_wp/34.0_wp, 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00150               &    -1.0_wp/ 2.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,  1.0_wp/2.0_wp , 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00151               &     4.0_wp/43.0_wp,-59.0_wp/86.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,59.0_wp/86.0_wp,-4.0_wp/43.0_wp, 0.0_wp,          &
00152               &     3.0_wp/98.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,-59.0_wp/98.0_wp, 0.0_wp        ,32.0_wp/49.0_wp,-4.0_wp/49.0_wp/),&
00153               & (/6,4/)  )
00154       D1blk = Transpose(D1blkT)
00155 
00156       !  Derivative operators are ``per-symmetric''
00157       do i=1,4
00158          do j=1,6
00159            D2blk(i,j)= - D1blk(5-i,7-j)
00160          end do
00161       end do
00162      
00163       !  Assemble derivative operator into compressed sparse row storage format
00164       call CSR_Filler(n,nnz,d1mat,D1blk,D2blk, ia,ja,a)
00165 
00166       !  account for spatial grid spacing.  Assumes domain is 0 <= x <= 1  
00167       a(:) = a(:) / h
00168 
00169       !  Derivative operator must differentiate monomials of sufficient order to be correct.
00170       call test_error(1,n,ia,ja,a)
00171 
00172       deallocate(d1mat,D1blk,D2blk,D1blkT)
00173 
00174 
00175       end subroutine D1_242
00176 
00177 ! =============================================================================
00178 
00179       subroutine D2_242(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00180 
00181       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00182 
00183       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00184       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00185 
00186       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00187       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00188       
00189       real(wp),  dimension(4  )                 ::  Pmat_L, Pinv_L
00190 
00191       integer                                   :: i,j
00192       real(wp)                                  :: m24
00193       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)      :: d1vec, d2mat
00194       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:,:)    :: M1blk, M2blk, M1blkT1, M1blkT2
00195       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:,:)    :: D1blk, D2blk
00196 
00197       continue
00198 
00199       if(n < 8) then 
00200         write(*,*)'Dimension not large enough to support D242: stopping'
00201         stop
00202       endif
00203       allocate(d1vec(1:4))
00204       allocate(d2mat(1:5))
00205       allocate(M1blk(1:4,1:6),M2blk(1:4,1:6))
00206       allocate(M1blkT1(1:6,1:4),M1blkT2(1:6,1:4))
00207       allocate(D1blk(1:4,1:6),D2blk(1:4,1:6))
00208 
00209   !    h = 1.0_wp / (n - 1)
00210 
00211       Pmat_L(1:4) = reshape((/17.0_wp/48.0_wp,59.0_wp/48.0_wp,43.0_wp/48.0_wp,49.0_wp/48.0_wp/),(/4/))
00212 
00213       Pinv_L(:)   = 1.0_wp / Pmat_L(:)
00214 
00215       d1vec(:) = + reshape((/-24.0_wp/17.0_wp, 59.0_wp/34.0_wp,-4.0_wp/17.0_wp, -3.0_wp/34.0_wp                /),(/4/))
00216       d2mat(:) = - reshape((/  1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-16.0_wp/12.0_wp,30.0_wp/12.0_wp,-16.0_wp/12.0_wp,1.0_wp/12.0_wp /),(/5/))
00217 
00218       m24 = 16815244.0_wp/410099621.0_wp
00219       M1blkT1= reshape(                                                                                                 &
00220               & (/  9.0_wp/ 8.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, +1.0_wp/12.0_wp,  1.0_wp/48.0_wp, 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00221               &   -59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 59.0_wp/24.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp,  0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00222               &     1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 55.0_wp/24.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 1.0_wp/12.0_wp, 0.0_wp,          &
00223               &     1.0_wp/48.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 59.0_wp/24.0_wp,-4.0_wp/ 3.0_wp, 1.0_wp/12.0_wp/),&
00224               & (/6,4/)  )
00225       M1blkT2= reshape(                                                                                         &
00226               & (/-1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp,  &
00227               &   +1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp,  &
00228               &   -1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp,  &
00229               &   +1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp/),&
00230               & (/6,4/)  )
00231       M1blk = Transpose(-M1blkT1-M1blkT2)
00232 
00233       do i=1,4
00234          do j=1,6
00235            M2blk(i,j)= + M1blk(5-i,7-j)
00236          end do
00237       end do
00238 
00239       do j = 1,4
00240         M1blk(1,  j) = M1blk(1,  j) - d1vec(j)
00241         M2blk(4,7-j) = M2blk(4,7-j) - d1vec(j)
00242       enddo
00243       do i = 1,4
00244         D1blk(i,:) = Pinv_L(  i)*M1blk(i,:)
00245         D2blk(i,:) = Pinv_L(5-i)*M2blk(i,:)
00246       enddo
00247 
00248       call CSR_Filler(n,nnz,d2mat,D1blk,D2blk, ia,ja,a)
00249 
00250       a(:) = a(:) / h / h
00251       call test_error(2,n,ia,ja,a)
00252 
00253       end subroutine D2_242
00254 
00255 ! ======================================================================================
00256 
00257       subroutine CSR_Filler(n,nnz,dmat,D1blk,D2blk, ia,ja,a)
00258 
00259       !  Store the Derivative matrix in CSR format
00260 
00261       implicit none
00262 
00263       real(wp),  parameter                     :: tol=1.0e-12_wp
00264 
00265       integer,                   intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00266       real(wp),  dimension(:),   intent(in   ) :: dmat
00267       real(wp),  dimension(:,:), intent(in   ) :: D1blk,D2blk
00268 
00269       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(  out) :: ia
00270       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(  out) :: ja
00271       real(wp),  dimension(:),   intent(  out) ::  a
00272 
00273       integer                                  :: i,j,k
00274       integer                                  :: icnt, jcnt
00275 
00276       continue
00277 
00278       icnt  = 0      ; jcnt = 0 
00279 
00280       ia(:) = 0      ; ja(:) = 0      ;
00281        a(:) = 0.0_wp ;
00282       ia(1) = 1      ! start at beginning of array
00283 
00284       !  load derivative matrix info into CSR buckets:  Left block boundary
00285 
00286       do i = 1,4
00287         jcnt = 0 
00288         do j = 1,6
00289           if(abs(D1blk(i,j)) >= tol) then
00290               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00291           ja(icnt) = j
00292            a(icnt) = D1blk(i,j)
00293           endif
00294         enddo
00295         ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00296       enddo
00297   
00298       !  load derivative matrix info into CSR buckets:  interior
00299       do i = 5,n-4
00300         jcnt = 0 
00301         do j = 1,5
00302           if(abs(dmat(j)) >= tol) then
00303               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00304           ja(icnt) = i-3+j
00305            a(icnt) = dmat(j)
00306           endif
00307         enddo
00308         ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00309       enddo
00310  
00311       do i = 1,4
00312          k = n-4+i
00313         jcnt = 0 
00314         do j = 1,6
00315           if(abs(D2blk(i,j)) >= tol) then
00316               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00317           ja(icnt) = n-6+j
00318            a(icnt) = D2blk(i,j)
00319           endif
00320         enddo
00321         ia(k+1) = ia(k) + jcnt
00322       enddo
00323       if(icnt /= nnz) then
00324         write(*,*)'dimension of nnz buckets is incorrect: stopping'
00325         write(*,*)'icnt, nnz', icnt, nnz
00326         stop
00327       endif
00328 
00329       end subroutine CSR_Filler
00330 
00331 ! ======================================================================================
00332 
00333       subroutine test_error(order,n,ia,ja,a)
00334 
00335       implicit none
00336 
00337       integer,                   intent(in) :: order, n
00338       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(in) :: ia
00339       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(in) :: ja
00340       real(wp),  dimension(:),   intent(in) ::  a
00341       integer                               ::  i
00342 
00343       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  :: err,  x0_vec ,  x1_vec ,   x2_vec,   x3_vec
00344       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::     d1x0_vec ,d1x1_vec , d1x2_vec, d1x3_vec
00345       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::     d1x0T_vec,d1x1T_vec,d1x2T_vec,d1x3T_vec
00346       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::      d2x0_vec, d2x1_vec, d2x2_vec, d2x3_vec
00347       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::     d2x0T_vec,d2x1T_vec,d2x2T_vec,d2x3T_vec
00348 
00349       real(wp)                              :: tnorm, x
00350 
00351       continue
00352 
00353       allocate(  x0_vec(n),  x1_vec(n),  x2_vec(n),  x3_vec(n))
00354       allocate(d1x0_vec(n) ,d1x1_vec(n) ,d1x2_vec(n) ,d1x3_vec(n) )
00355       allocate(d1x0T_vec(n),d1x1T_vec(n),d1x2T_vec(n),d1x3T_vec(n))
00356       allocate(d2x0_vec(n) ,d2x1_vec(n) ,d2x2_vec(n) ,d2x3_vec(n) )
00357       allocate(d2x0T_vec(n),d2x1T_vec(n),d2x2T_vec(n),d2x3T_vec(n))
00358       allocate(err(n))
00359 
00360       do i = 1,n
00361          x = 1.0_wp*(i-1)/(n-1)
00362         x0_vec(i) = 1.0_wp       ; d1x0_vec(i) = 0.0_wp     ; d2x0_vec(i) = 0.0_wp
00363         x1_vec(i) = 1.0_wp*x     ; d1x1_vec(i) = 1.0_wp     ; d2x1_vec(i) = 0.0_wp
00364         x2_vec(i) = 1.0_wp*x*x   ; d1x2_vec(i) = 2.0_wp*x   ; d2x2_vec(i) = 2.0_wp
00365         x3_vec(i) = 1.0_wp*x*x*x ; d1x3_vec(i) = 3.0_wp*x*x ; d2x3_vec(i) = 6.0_wp*x
00366       enddo
00367 
00368       if(order == 1) then
00369          call amux_local (n, x0_vec,d1x0T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00370          call amux_local (n, x1_vec,d1x1T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00371          call amux_local (n, x2_vec,d1x2T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00372          call amux_local (n, x3_vec,d1x3T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00373          err(:) = d1x0_vec(:) - d1x0T_vec(:) &
00374                 + d1x1_vec(:) - d1x1T_vec(:) &
00375                 + d1x2_vec(:) - d1x2T_vec(:) !&
00376                 !+ d1x3_vec(:) - d1x3T_vec(:)
00377          tnorm = maxval(err)
00378 !         write(*,*)'error in  first derivative',tnorm
00379 !         if(tnorm >= tol) write(*,*)'maxerr',maxval(err)
00380       elseif(order == 2) then
00381          call amux_local (n, x0_vec,d2x0T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00382          call amux_local (n, x1_vec,d2x1T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00383          call amux_local (n, x2_vec,d2x2T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00384          call amux_local (n, x3_vec,d2x3T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00385 
00386          err(:) = d2x0_vec(:) - d2x0T_vec(:) &
00387                 + d2x1_vec(:) - d2x1T_vec(:) &
00388                 + d2x2_vec(:) - d2x2T_vec(:) !&
00389                 !+ d2x3_vec(:) - d2x3T_vec(:)
00390          tnorm = maxval(err)
00391 !         write(*,*)'error in second derivative',tnorm
00392 !         if(tnorm >= tol) write(*,*)'maxerr',maxval(err)
00393       endif
00394 
00395 
00396       end subroutine test_error
00397 
00398 ! ======================================================================================
00399 
00400       subroutine amux_local (n, x, y, a,ja,ia)
00401 
00402         implicit none
00403 
00404         real(wp), dimension(:), intent(in   ) :: x,a
00405         real(wp), dimension(:), intent(  out) :: y
00406         integer,                intent(in   ) :: n
00407         integer, dimension(:),  intent(in   ) :: ja,ia
00408 
00409         !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00410         !         A times a vector
00411         !----------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00412         ! multiplies a matrix by a vector using the dot product form
00413         ! Matrix A is stored in compressed sparse row storage.
00414         !
00415         ! on entry:
00416         !----------
00417         ! n     = row dimension of A
00418         ! x     = real array of length equal to the column dimension of
00419         !         the A matrix.
00420         ! a, ja,
00421         !    ia = input matrix in compressed sparse row format.
00422         !
00423         ! on return:
00424         !-----------
00425         ! y     = real array of length n, containing the product y=Ax
00426         !
00427         !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00428         ! local variables
00429     
00430         real(wp) :: t
00431         integer  :: i, k
00432             
00433         do i = 1,n
00434           t = 0.0_wp        !     compute the inner product of row i with vector x
00435           do k=ia(i), ia(i+1)-1
00436             t = t + a(k)*x(ja(k))
00437           enddo
00438           y(i) = t          !     store result in y(i) 
00439         enddo
00440 
00441       end subroutine amux_local
00442 
00443 
00444       end module SBP_Coef_Module
